title: 87/555/EEC: Commission Decision of 16 November 1987 on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in Denmark pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 (Only the Danish text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 16 November 1987
on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in Denmark pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85
(Only the Danish text is authentic)
(87/555/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The provisions provided for by the Danish Government for the implementation of Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 meet the conditions for a financial contribution from the Community to the common measure provided for in Article 1 of Regulation (EEC) No 797/85.

The financial contribution from the Community provided for in Article 1 also covers aids granted to agricultural holdings since 1 October 1985, prior to the entry into force of the provisions forwarded, under the conditions laid down therein.
This Decision is addressed to Denmark.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 November 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
